title: Men of the Harem - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Confident Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Demon Lord   Devoted Love Interests   Empires   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Imperial Harem   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Mysterious Past   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Polyandry   Revenge   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Identity   Secretive Protagonist   Secrets   Slow Romance   Sword And Magic   Vampires
author: Alpha Tart   알파타르트
description:
“Why should I only marry one man?” the  female emperor declared. 

“In past generations, the emperor has had at least five concubines, and an average of fifteen. Now that I am emperor, I should have at least five concubines too. The son of a chancellor? The successor to a powerful family? If they are good, send them to the harem. 

“My favorite one will become the male empress.”>
